name: Toot-Suite GJL Summer Games Jam
description:
Toote-Suite is a comedic third-person action game based around a single use core mechanic of farting. The player has a single use of their "Fart" ability and must go round a low poly market environment doing minigames and eating food to increase their fart power and attract npcs close to them. Once they feel ready players will then press Q to fart affecting the most amount of people possible for a high score.

Enjoy :)
